name: Joi Rx
description:
Made for the 24 hour Philly Game Jam! Based off of the theme of random vague themes for each teammate, Our group ended up with "Illness, Horde, and the Mundane".

So Joi Rx was created! You're a scientist in training who's trying to make the world a little less bleak and boring by finding ways on how to make everyone filled with joy!

How to win: make everyone happy!
How to lose: let everyone die from boredom!
How to play: click and drag to make a joy bomb!

Code by Josh Safran and Patrick McGrath

Art by Marinna Romero :)
